list.name: Changes
list.comment: #fix #jsx #git Updated database fields and variable names in chart and index components. Updated the database with new instructor and location information, as well as student, class, school, and vehicle information. Corrected workspace links and property component settings.

task.summary: #fix #jsx Add new configuration routes and menu items for company information, payment integration, security policies, and zip code, update workspace XML file and project settings.

#fix #jsx A refactoring component that includes a new email template module and pagination functionality, updates to communications, ticket routing and menu items, and customization of project settings in the workspace XML.

#fix #jsx #npm Added new expense and finance components, updated imports in index.jsx, changed text for clarity, and added new paths and elements to menu items and package files, adding dependencies and peer dependencies for react-apexcharts and apexcharts, and new modules for functionality SVG. Updated workspace and project settings XML file, added new configuration routes and menu items for company information, payment integration, security policies and zip code.
#fix #js #json Update database with new instructor and location information, as well as student, classes, schools, and vehicles data. Fix workspace references and properties component settings.

#fix #jsx #git Updated database fields and variable names in chart and index components. Updated the database with new instructor and location information, as well as student, class, school, and vehicle information. Corrected workspace links and property component settings.
